name: RareLinkImplementationGuide
title: RareLink Implementation Guide
publisher: Berlin Institute of Health - Charité Universitätsmedizin Berlin

contact.name: Berlin Institute of Health - Charité Universitätsmedizin Berlin

description: An Implementation Guide for RareLink Common Data Model, based on the ontology-based rare disease common data model (RD-CDM) harmonising the European Rare Disease Infrastructure Common Data Set, HL7 FHIR R4, and Phenopackets; and integrating the IPS 2.0.2 profiles and Genomics Reporting 3.0.0 profiles.

resource.name: Age at Diagnosis
resource.description: ERDRI-CDS - The age at which the condition was diagnosed.

resource.name: Age at Diagnosis Value Set
resource.description: Value set for capturing age at diagnosis.

resource.name: Age at Onset
resource.description: ERDRI-CDS - The age at which the condition first appeared.

resource.name: Age at Onset Value Set
resource.description: Value set for capturing age at onset.

resource.name: Age Category Value Set
resource.description: Value set for capturing the age category of a patient.

resource.name: Age of Onset Value Set
resource.description: Value set for capturing the age of onset for phenotypes.

resource.name: Agreement to Be Contacted
resource.description: ERDRI-CDS - Agreement to be contacted for research purposes.

resource.name: Agreement to Be Contacted Value Set
resource.description: Value set for capturing agreement to be contacted for research.

resource.name: Birth Place
resource.description: The patient's place of birth.

resource.name: Cause of Death
resource.description: The cause of death for the patient.

resource.name: Cause of Death Code
resource.description: The ICD-10 code representing the cause of death.

resource.name: Cause of Death Definition
resource.description: The SNOMED CT definition of the cause of death concept.

resource.name: Clinical Significance Value Set
resource.description: LOINC LA codes for the clinical significance of a variant.

resource.name: Consanguinity
resource.description: Indicates whether there is consanguinity in the family relationship.

resource.name: Consanguinity Value Set
resource.description: Value set for indicating whether there is consanguinity in the family relationship.

resource.name: Consent to Reuse Data
resource.description: ERDRI-CDS - Consent to the reuse of data.

resource.name: Consent to Reuse Data Value Set
resource.description: Value set for capturing consent to reuse data.

resource.name: Date of Admission
resource.description: The date of the patient's admission.

resource.name: DNA Change Type Value Set
resource.description: LOINC LA codes enumerating various DNA change types.

resource.name: Encounter Class Value Set
resource.description: Value set for encounter classes, including custom RareLink-specific codes.

resource.name: Family Member Sex Value Set
resource.description: Value set for capturing the sex of a family member.

resource.name: Family Relationship Value Set
resource.description: Value set for capturing family member relationships.

resource.name: Genomic Source Class Value Set
resource.description: LOINC LA codes enumerating germline, somatic, fetal, etc.

resource.name: Karyotypic Sex Value Set
resource.description: Value set for capturing karyotypic sex.

resource.name: Level of Evidence Value Set
resource.description: LOINC LA codes describing evidence strength for a variant.

resource.name: Phenotype Modifier
resource.description: Captures modifiers for the phenotypic feature, such as severity or specific classifications.

resource.name: Phenotype Severity Value Set
resource.description: Value set for capturing phenotype severity.

resource.name: Phenotype Status
resource.description: Captures the status of a phenotypic feature, such as confirmed present or refuted.

resource.name: Phenotype Status Value Set
resource.description: Value set for capturing phenotype status.

resource.name: Propositus
resource.description: Indicates whether the family member is the propositus.

resource.name: Propositus Value Set
resource.description: Value set for indicating whether the family member is the propositus.

resource.name: RareLink Condition for Undiagnosed RD Case
resource.description: A RareLink-specific Condition profile for documenting undiagnosed rare disease cases based on the IPS Condition profile.

resource.name: RareLink Consent
resource.description: A RareLink-specific Consent profile based on the Consent resource.

resource.name: RareLink Diagnostic Implication Observation
resource.description:
A RareLink-specific profile extending the HL7 Genomics Reporting 'diagnostic-implication' profile 
  for documenting diagnostic significance, evidence levels, and associated phenotypes 
  (genetic_findings.diagnostic_implication).

resource.name: RareLink Encounter
resource.description: A RareLink-specific Encounter profile based on the Encounter resource.

resource.name: RareLink Family History
resource.description: A RareLink-specific FamilyMemberHistory profile based on the FamilyMemberHistory resource.

resource.name: RareLink Genetic Variant Observation
resource.description:
A RareLink-specific profile for documenting genetic findings 
  (genetic_findings.variant), based on the HL7 Genomics Reporting variant profile.

resource.name: RareLink IPS Condition
resource.description: A RareLink-specific Condition profile based on the IPS Condition profile.

resource.name: RareLink IPS Measurement Laboratory
resource.description: A RareLink-specific profile for laboratory measurements based on the IPS Observation profile.

resource.name: RareLink IPS Measurement Radiology
resource.description: A RareLink-specific profile for radiology measurements based on the IPS Observation profile.

resource.name: RareLink IPS Patient
resource.description: A RareLink-specific profile for the IPS Patient resource.

resource.name: RareLink IPS Procedure
resource.description: A RareLink-specific profile for the IPS Procedure resource.

resource.name: RareLink Observation Age Category
resource.description:
A RareLink-specific profile for capturing the age category of
 a patient as an observation, based on the ERDRI-CDS value set.

resource.name: RareLink Observation Gestation at Birth
resource.description: A RareLink-specific profile for capturing gestation length at birth.

resource.name: RareLink Observation Karyotypic Sex
resource.description: A RareLink-specific profile for capturing karyotypic sex information.

resource.name: RareLink Observation Measurements (Others)
resource.description: A RareLink-specific profile for measurements that do not fall under IPS laboratory, radiology, procedures, or vital signs.

resource.name: RareLink Observation Phenotypic Feature
resource.description: A RareLink-specific profile for capturing phenotypic features.

resource.name: RareLink Vital Signs Measurements
resource.description: A RareLink-specific profile for vital signs measurements.

resource.name: Recorded Sex at Birth
resource.description: The sex assigned to the patient at birth.

resource.name: Reference Genome Value Set
resource.description: LOINC LA codes specifying the reference genome build.

resource.name: Resolution Date
resource.description: The date when the phenotypic feature resolved.

resource.name: Severity Value Set
resource.description: Value set for severity levels of conditions.

resource.name: Sex at Birth Value Set
resource.description: Value set for capturing the sex assigned at birth.

resource.name: Structural Variant Method Value Set
resource.description: LOINC LA codes enumerating methods for detecting structural variants.

resource.name: Temporal Pattern Value Set
resource.description: Value set for capturing the temporal pattern of phenotypic features.

resource.name: Undiagnosed Rare Disease Case Value Set
resource.description: Value set for capturing undiagnosed rare disease cases.

resource.name: Vital Status
resource.description: Coded representation of a patient's vital status

resource.name: Vital Status Value Set
resource.description: Value set for capturing the vital status of the patient.

resource.name: Zygosity Value Set
resource.description: LOINC LA codes enumerating various zygosity states.
